rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A small foyer with a north-facing entrance for maximum Vastu energy. The lobby is designed to be welcoming and utilitarian, reflecting the Brutalist style.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with exposed concrete and raw materials typical of Brutalist design. Large windows on the north side allow natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact, efficient kitchen with industrial finishes. Designed for functionality and ease of movement.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A designated dining space integrated with the living room. Minimalist design with a concrete slab dining table.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: An expansive library area designed for quiet study and reading. Natural light streams in from the north, complementing the brutalist aesthetic with built-in bookshelves made of raw concrete.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A small bathroom adjacent to the living area for convenience, incorporating minimalistic design and practical fixtures.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: A dedicated washroom space ensuring privacy. The utilitarian design is in line with Brutalist architecture.
